also_known_as: วิศิษฏ์ ศาสนเที่ยง
biography: Wisit Sasanatieng (วิศิษฏ์ ศาสนเที่ยง)  is a Thai film director and screenwriter of Chinese descent, best known for his colorful debut feature film, Tears of the Black Tiger, he is among a "New Wave" of Thai directors that include Nonzee Nimibutr, Pen-Ek Ratanaruang.
name: Wisit Sasanatieng
